txt.en: 'So you are not happy with your tundra-pony? Well, I can offer you an exchange, as I would not want one of my horses where it was not desired. However, this is not a decision to take lightly, so I will give you a moment to think about this.\n\n'If you are really sure you wish to exchange your tundra-pony, speak to me again, and I will give you a receipt in return. You can then exchange the receipt for a tundra-horse or tundra-pony.'

'So you have decided you want to exchange your tundra-pony after all? So be it. Look over this receipt and tell me if it looks fine to you.\n\n'And this time, I hope you are more sure of your choice. Choosing a pony should not be something done lightly!'
Cam Applewood has told you that you can exchange your tundra-pony for another horse or pony.

Cam Applewood is at the Hengstacer Farm, north of the Bree Festival Grounds.\n\nCam suggested you take a moment to consider whether or not you wish to exchange your horse. If you decide you do want to exchange your horse, you should speak to Cam again.
